title: The spy discovering the danger of Arminian heresie and Spanish trecherie: written by I.R.
author: Russell, John, d. 1688.
publisher: By the successors of Giles Thorp],
notes: I.R. = John Russell. Also sometimes attributed to John Rhodes and to John Robinson.
The imprint is false; printed in Amsterdam by the successors of Giles Thorp (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
